citation: Proclamation under the Crown Lands (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 1997 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Crown Lands (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 1997

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Crown Lands (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 1997 fix 31 March 1999 as the day on which that Act commences.

22 March 1999

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

D. E. LLEWELLYN

Minister for Primary Industries, Water and Environment

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 31 March 1999

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Water and Environment.
